description:
Winnovative HTML to Converter for Xamarin is library that can be used in Xamarin Applications for iOS, Android and Mac to convert HTML to PDF, HTML to Image and HTML to SVG.

While the Winnovative HTML to PDF Converter Library for .NET does not depend on any external services or programs, the solution for Xamarin requires the installation of a HTML to PDF server which was built on the library for .NET. 

In order to use the Winnovative HTML to PDF Converter for Xamarin you first have to install the Winnovative HTML to PDF Server. Winnovative HTML to PDF Converter Server can run either in a Windows Service on a Windows machine or in an Azure Cloud Service deployed in Microsoft Azure cloud. The client library that you link in your Xamarin applications will connect to the server to convert HTML to PDF, to Image or to SVG.

The converter offers full support for HTML tags, HTML5 with CSS3, SVG and Web Fonts, page breaks control, media type rules, repeating HTML table header and footer, hierarchical bookmarks, tables of contents, fillable PDF forms, HTML with page numbering in header and footer.
summary: Convert HTML to PDF, HTML to Image and HTML to SVG in your Xamarin applications for iOS, Android and Mac using the Winnovative HTML to PDF Converter.
title: Winnovative HTML to PDF Converter Client for Xamarin
